String.Name: Output File
String.Description: The /OUT option overrides the default name and location of the program that the linker creates.

Integer.Name: Show Progress
Integer.Description: Enables detailed display progress.

Value.ValueText: About COMDAT folding during optimized linking (/VERBOSE:ICF)
About data removed during optimized linking (/VERBOSE:REF)
About linker activity related to managed code (/VERBOSE:CLR)

String.Name: Version
String.Description: The /VERSION option tells the linker to put a version number in the header of the .exe or .dll file. Use DUMPBIN /HEADERS to see the image version field of the OPTIONAL HEADER VALUES to see the effect of /VERSION.

Boolean.Name: Enable Incremental Linking
Boolean.Description: Enables incremental linking.

Boolean.Name: Suppress Startup Banner
Boolean.Description: Suppress the display of the startup banner and information messages.

Boolean.Name: Ignore Import Library
Boolean.Description: Specifies that the import library generated by this configuration should not be imported into dependent projects.

Boolean.Name: Register Output
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether to register the primary output of this build.

Boolean.Name: Per-user Redirection
Boolean.Description: When Register Output is enabled, Per-user redirection forces registry writes to HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT to be redirected to HKEY_CURRENT_USER.

StringList.Name: Additional Library Directories
StringList.Description: Specifies one or more additional paths to search for libraries; configuration specific; use semi-colon delimited list if more than one.

Boolean.Name: Link Library Dependencies
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether or not library outputs from project dependencies are automatically linked in.

Boolean.Name: Use Library Dependency Inputs
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether or not the inputs to the librarian tool are used rather than the library file itself when linking in outputs of project dependencies.

Boolean.Name: Use Unicode Response Files
Boolean.Description: Instructs the project system to generate UNICODE response files when spawning the linker. Set this property to Yes when files in the project have UNICODE paths.

Boolean.Name: Link Status
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether the linker should display a progress indicator showing what percentage of the link is complete. The default is to not display this status information. (/LTCG:STATUS|LTCG:NOSTATUS)

Boolean.Name: Prevent Dll Binding
Boolean.Description: /ALLOWBIND:NO sets a bit in a DLL's header that indicates to Bind.exe that the image is not allowed to be bound. You may not want a DLL to be bound if it has been digitally signed (binding invalidates the signature).

Boolean.Name: Treat Linker Warning As Errors
Boolean.Description: /WX causes no output file to be generated if the linker generates a warning.

Integer.Name: Force File Output
Integer.Description: The /FORCE option tells the linker to create an .exe file or DLL even if a symbol is referenced but not defined or is multiply defined. It may create invalid exe file.

Integer.Name: Create Hot Patchable Image
Integer.Description: Prepares an image for hotpatching.

String.Name: Specify Section Attributes
String.Description: The /SECTION option changes the attributes of a section, overriding the attributes set when the .obj file for the section was compiled.

StringList.Name: Additional Dependencies
StringList.Description: Specifies additional items to add to the link line (ex:kernel32.lib); configuration specific.

Boolean.Name: Ignore All Default Libraries
Boolean.Description: Ignore all default libraries during linking.

StringList.Name: Ignore Specific Default Libraries
StringList.Description: Specifies one or more names of default libraries to ignore; separate multiple libraries with semi-colon.

String.Name: Module Definition File
String.Description: The /DEF option passes a module-definition file (.def) to the linker. Only one .def file can be specified to LINK.

StringList.Name: Add Module to Assembly
StringList.Description: The /ASSEMBLYMODULE option allows you to add a module reference to an assembly. Type information in the module will not be available to the assembly program that added the module reference. However, type information in the module will be available to any program that references the assembly.

StringList.Name: Embed Managed Resource File
StringList.Description: /ASSEMBLYRESOURCE embeds a resource file in the output file.

StringList.Name: Force Symbol References
StringList.Description: The /INCLUDE option tells the linker to add a specified symbol to the symbol table.

StringList.Name: Delay Load Dlls
StringList.Description: The /DELAYLOAD option causes delayed loading of DLLs. The dllname specifies a DLL to delay load.

StringList.Name: Assembly Link Resource
StringList.Description: The /ASSEMBLYLINKRESOURCE option creates a link to a .NET Framework resource in the output file; the resource file is not placed in the output file.

Boolean.Name: Generate Manifest
Boolean.Description: Specifies if the linker should always generate a manifest file.

String.Name: Manifest File
String.Description: Specifies the name of the manifest file to generate. Only used if Generate Manifest is true.

StringList.Name: Additional Manifest Dependencies
StringList.Description: Specifies the additional XML manifest fragments the linker will put in the manifest file.

Boolean.Name: Allow Isolation
Boolean.Description: Specifies manifest file lookup behavior for side-by-side asemblies.

Boolean.Name: Enable User Account Control (UAC)
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether or not User Account Control is enabled.

Integer.Name: UAC Execution Level
Integer.Description: Specifies the requested execution level for the application when running with User Account Control.

Boolean.Name: UAC Bypass UI Protection
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether or not to bypass user interface protection levels for other windows on the desktop. Set this property to 'Yes' only for accessibility applications.

Boolean.Name: Generate Debug Info
Boolean.Description: Enables generation of debug information.

String.Name: Generate Program Database File
String.Description: Enables generation of a program database .pdb file; requires Generate Debug Info option to be enabled.

String.Name: Strip Private Symbols
String.Description: Do not put private symbols into the generated PDB file specified.

Boolean.Name: Generate Map File
Boolean.Description: Enables generation of map file during linking.

String.Name: Map File Name
String.Description: Specifies a name for the mapfile.

Boolean.Name: Map Exports
Boolean.Description: Includes exported functions in map file information.

Boolean.Name: Debuggable Assembly
Boolean.Description: Emits the Debuggable attributes to the assembly.

Integer.Name: Sub System
Integer.Description: Specifies subsystem for the linker.

String.Name: Minimum Required Version
String.Description: Specify the minimum required version of the subsystem. The arguments are decimal numbers in the range 0 through 65,535.

Integer.Name: Heap Reserve Size
Integer.Description: Specifies total heap allocation size in virtual memory. Default is 1 MB.

Integer.Name: Heap Commit Size
Integer.Description: Specifies total heap size in physical memory. Default is 4 KB.

Integer.Name: Stack Reserve Size
Integer.Description: Specifies the total stack allocation size in virtual memory. Default is 1 MB.

Integer.Name: Stack Commit Size
Integer.Description: Specifies the total stack allocation size in physical memory. Default is 4 KB.

Boolean.Name: Enable Large Addresses
Boolean.Description: Enables handling addresses larger than 2 GB.

Boolean.Name: Terminal Server
Boolean.Description: The /TSAWARE option sets a flag in the IMAGE_OPTIONAL_HEADER DllCharacteristics field in the program image's optional header. When this flag is set, Terminal Server will not make certain chnages to the application.

Boolean.Name: Swap Run From CD
Boolean.Description: Run application from the swap location of the CD.

Boolean.Name: Swap Run From Network
Boolean.Description: Run application from the swap location of the Net.

Integer.Name: Driver
Integer.Description: Specifies the driver for the linker.

Integer.Name: References
Integer.Description: Enables elimination of functions and/or data that are never referenced.

Boolean.Name: Enable COMDAT Folding
Boolean.Description: Removes redundant COMDAT symbols from the linker output.

String.Name: Function Order
String.Description: Places COMDATs into the image in a predetermined order; specify file name containing the order; no incremental linking.

String.Name: Profile Guided Database
String.Description: Specifies the database file to use when using profile guided optimizations (/PGD:database). This property should only be used when using Profile Guided Optimizations.

Integer.Name: Link Time Code Generation
Integer.Description: Enables link time code generation of objects compile with Whole Program Optimization set.

String.Name: MIDL Commands
String.Description: Specifies MIDL command line options.

Boolean.Name: Ignore Embedded IDL
Boolean.Description: Ignore embedded .idlsym sections of object files.

String.Name: Merged IDL Base File Name
String.Description: Specifies the basename of the .IDL file that contains the contents of the merged IDLSYM sections.

String.Name: Type Library
String.Description: Specifies the name of the type library file.

Integer.Name: TypeLib Resource ID
Integer.Description: Specifies the ID number to assign to the .tlb file in the compiled resources.

Boolean.Name: Generate Windows Metadata
Boolean.Description: Enables or disables generation of Windows Metadata.

String.Name: Windows Metadata File
String.Description: The /WINMDFILE option switch.

String.Name: Windows Metadata Key File
String.Description: Specify key or key pair to sign and Windows Metadata. (/WINMDKEYFILE:filename)

String.Name: Windows Metadata Key Container
String.Description: Specify a key container to sign an Windows Metadata. (WINMDKEYCONTAINER:name)

Boolean.Name: Windows Metadata Delay Sign
Boolean.Description: Partially sign an Windows Metadata. Use /WINMDDELAYSIGN if you only want to place the public key in the Windows Metadata. The default is /WINMDDELAYSIGN:NO.

String.Name: Entry Point
String.Description: Sets the starting address for an .exe file or DLL.

Boolean.Name: No Entry Point
Boolean.Description: Create DLL with no entry point; incompatible with setting the 'Entry Point' option.

Boolean.Name: Set Checksum
Boolean.Description: Enables setting the checksum in the header of a .exe.

String.Name: Base Address
String.Description: Specifies base address for program; numeric or string.

Boolean.Name: Randomized Base Address
Boolean.Description: Generates an executable image that can be randomly rebased at load-time by using the address space layout randomization (ASLR) feature.

Boolean.Name: Fixed Base Address
Boolean.Description: Specifies if image must be loaded at fixed address.

Boolean.Name: Data Execution Prevention (DEP)
Boolean.Description: Indicates that an executable was tested to be compatible with the Windows Data Execution Prevention feature.

Boolean.Name: Data Execution Prevention (DEP)
Boolean.Description: Marks an executable as having been tested to be compatible with Windows Data Execution Prevention feature. (/NXCOMPAT[:NO])

Boolean.Name: Turn Off Assembly Generation
Boolean.Description: Specifies that no assembly will be generated even though common language runtime information is present in the object file.

Boolean.Name: Delay Loaded DLL
Boolean.Description: Specifies to allow explicit unloading of the delayed load DLLs.

Boolean.Name: Unload delay loaded DLL
Boolean.Description: The UNLOAD qualifiers tells the delay-load helper function to support explicit unloading of the DLL. (/DELAY:UNLOAD)

Boolean.Name: Nobind delay loaded DLL
Boolean.Description: The NOBIND qualifier tells the linker not to include a bindable IAT in the final image. The default is to create the bindable IAT for delay-loaded DLLs. (/DELAY:NOBIND)

String.Name: Import Library
String.Description: Specifies which import library to generate.

String.Name: Merge Sections
String.Description: Causes the linker to merge section 'from' into section 'to' does not exist, section 'from' is renamed as 'to'.

Integer.Name: Target Machine
Integer.Description: Specifies the subsystem for the linker.

Integer.Name: Target Machine
Integer.Description: The /MACHINE option specifies the target platform for the program.

Boolean.Name: Profile
Boolean.Description: Produces an output file that can be used with the Enterprise Developer performance profiler.

Integer.Name: CLR Thread Attribute
Integer.Description: Specifies the threading attribute for the entry point of your CLR program.

Integer.Name: CLR Image Type
Integer.Description: Specifies the type of a CLR image. Useful when linking object files of different types.

String.Name: Key File
String.Description: Specifies the file that contains the key for strongly naming the output assembly.

String.Name: Key Container
String.Description: Specifies the named container of the key for strongly naming the output assembly.

Boolean.Name: Delay Sign
Boolean.Description: Indicates whether the output assembly should be delayed signed.

Boolean.Name: Delay Sign
Boolean.Description: Partially sign an assembly. Use /DELAYSIGN if you only want to place the public key in the assembly. The default is /DELAYSIGN:NO.

Integer.Name: Error Reporting
Integer.Description: Specifies how internal tool errors should be reported back to Microsoft. The default in the IDE is prompt. The default from command line builds is queue.

Integer.Name: Error Reporting
Integer.Description: Allows you to provide internal compiler error (ICE) information directly to the Visual C++ team.

Boolean.Name: CLR Unmanaged Code Check
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether the linker will apply T:System.Security.SuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurityAttribute to linker -generated invoke calls from managed code into native DLLs.

Boolean.Name: CLR Unmanaged Code Check
Boolean.Description: /CLRUNAMANAGEDCODECHECK specifies whether the linker will apply SuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurityAttribute to linker-generated PInvoke calls from managed code into native DLLs.

Boolean.Name: Detect One Definition Rule violations
Boolean.Description: Detect One Definition Rule violations for user defined types. This option requires debug information (Zi/ZI/Z7 and DEBUG) in each module and in the program to diagnose ODR violations. (/ODR)

String.Name: SectionAlignment
String.Description: The /ENTRY option specifies an entry point function as the starting address for an .exe file or DLL.

Integer.Name: Preserve Last Error Code for PInvoke Calls
Integer.Description: /CLRSUPPORTLASTERROR, which is on by default, preserves the last error code of functions called through the P/Invoke mechanism, which allows you to call native functions in DLLS, from code compiled with /clr.

Boolean.Name: Image Has Safe Exception Handlers
Boolean.Description: When /SAFESEH is specified, the linker will only produce an image if it can also produce a table of the image's safe exception handlers. This table specifies for the operating system which exception handlers are valid for the image.
